Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks:
R0106: At least one of B10-01 or B10-06 is required
E0105: Only one of B10-01 or B10-05 may be present
B1001 is the carrier assigned reference number.
B1001 is the carrier's PRO (invoice number) that identifies the shipment.

Name: Shipment Identification Number
Notes: Identification number assigned to the shipment by the shipper that uniquely identifies the shipment from origin to ultimate destination and is not subject to modification; (Does not contain blanks or special characters)

Name: Standard Carrier Alpha Code
Remarks: B1003 is required when used in Transaction Set 214.

Name: Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks: P0506: If either B10-05 or B10-06 is present, then the other is required

Name: Reference Identification
Notes: Reference information as defined for a particular Transaction Set or as specified by the Reference Identification Qualifier
Remarks: B1006 is the carrier assigned bar code identification or another carrier assigned shipment identification, such as a manifest number.

Name: Yes/No Condition or Response Code
Notes: Code indicating a Yes or No condition or response
Remarks: B1007 indicates if the reference numbers included in this transmission were transmitted to the carrier via EDI or key entered by the carrier. A "Y" indicates that the carrier received the reference numbers in an EDI transmission; an "N" indicates that the carrier did not receive the reference numbers in an EDI transmission and key entered the data from a shipper supplied document.
